Content.Text:
<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. What do you want?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...Oh, good morning. *yawn* I don't think I got
enough sleep last night...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Morning, <MYNAME>. Do all farmers have to
wake up as early as you do?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, you going out today?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I always feel super-relaxed around noon. Like, in
the morning, I'm all get-up-and-go, and then at
noon, I'm like, "Time for a siesta."

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Oh, pardon me, <MYNAME>. I was just
thinking about the research I've been working
on.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening...oh, evening! Night already, huh?
Wow, the day went by fast.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Evening, <MYNAME>. You taking a night time
walk?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm getting kinda tired. I should probably turn in
for the night.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Morning, <MYNAME>. Look at you, all up and at
'em. Makes me want to keep up with you.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>, good morning. Huh. I feel all
energetic all of a sudden...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Oh, uh, never mind that! Carry on!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
G-good morning. I was hoping to see you, but I
didn't know if I'd get to.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...Should we, um, take the next step as a
couple? And what is that next step, exactly...?
*murmur*
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Whoa?! H-hey, h-how long have you been
standing there?! If you saw me, why didn't you
say anything?!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Are you going out? I'd, um,
like to spend a little more time with you...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...I-I mean, never mind! I didn't say anything!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why are you walking around like that? Feeling
restless?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Well, good thing you are, 'cause now you're
here, and we can talk like this.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, good evening. By the way, I haven't talked to
you today until just now... Is everything all
right?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Evening! Pretty out tonight, isn't it? I mean, not
that I just wanted to talk about the weather...
<PAGE>
Um, actually, yeah, that's all I wanted to talk
about, is the weather. So...let's just leave it at
that! Yeah.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Evening, <MYNAME>. Did you come all the way
to see me this late at night? ...Hmm, you don't
say?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Busy as usual
today? You ought to spend a little more time at
home now and again.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. ...Ha ha, look at
your bed head! ...Okay, there, I fixed it.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Let's make today a
productive one! But don't push yourself too
hard.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Are you okay? You didn't talk to me at all this
morning... Were you that busy?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Has your work settled down yet? Since I didn't
get a chance to talk to you this morning, I got
kinda worried.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong, <MYNAME>? ...Huh? You're sad
'cause you "didn't get your daily dose of Licorice
this morning?"
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>S-seriously...? Did you really just say that?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
We've gone the whole day without talking to
each other. What've you been up to?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Oh, look at the time. How's your day been?
Busy as usual?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You must be tired today. Now that your work's
all done, how about we spend a little time
together?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a perfect day to go plant-watching. Where
should I go today...?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's raining, huh...? The mountain paths are
going to be all slippery. Watch your step.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...Ugh, this summer heat is just killing me!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Summer rain is a blessing for the plants. Except
for those couple of plants that hate the rain.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Lovely today, isn't it? Whenever it's this nice and
sunny out, I always get a little sleepy...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Looks like this rain's going to keep up all day
long.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sunny or not, this season's usually pretty cold.
So plants don't show much activity.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cold and snowy today, huh? I wonder if this
snow's going to pile up.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's so windy outside. Probably because of the
typhoon. I hope the plants are going to be
okay...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You know, too much snow can actually crush
the plants underneath it. I hope they're all okay...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know the farm's important, but why don't we
spend some time at home today?
<PAGE>
If you go out in this storm, you'll get hurt.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The snow's really coming down. Maybe we
should just stay inside today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>We both want to go out and get our work done,
but it's dangerous out there right now. Let's just
spend today as a family.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up? You look so happy. Oh, you're seeing
someone?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Nice! That's great news. Best wishes.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anytime I live near a restaurant, I tend to go
there a lot. If the food's good, I can't stay away.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't usually spend a lot of time in big crowds
and busy places, but I kind of like the bustle in
this restaurant.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I used to live in a village next to Kam's village.
<PAGE>
But we hadn't ever talked to each other before
we both happened to move here.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The mountain is covered with all kinds of
interesting plants. Moving here was totally worth
it.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where there're plants, there're insects, and vice
versa.
<PAGE>
Maybe if I chase enough bugs around, I'll find a
secret flower garden or something. Worth a try,
right?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I try to stay away from rivers. They're full of
gross, slimy fish. Eeew!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The plants around here are odd enough to be
worth studying.
<PAGE>
Ah, time always flies when I'm foraging here...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, the more I look at your farm, the
more I see how it reflects your character. Are all
farms like that?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. It's easy to grow tea leaves, fruit trees and
spices here, huh? This field looks perfect for
those crops.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...This farm really reflects its caretaker's
personality well...
<PAGE>
...Hm? Oh, it's you, <MYNAME>. No, I was just
observing the farm over there. Don't mind me...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The crops here always look amazing. I can tell
how well taken care of they are at a glance.
<PAGE>
Whoever the caretaker is, I bet these crops are
grateful toward them.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Looks like you can grow several kinds of crops
here.
<PAGE>
I'm curious about the condition of each field...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder which farmer is using that field.
<PAGE>
I come here a lot to study plants, and I always
check out the fields while I'm here.
<PAGE>
I'm looking forward to seeing what kind of crops
grow here, and how well they do.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a beautiful flower garden. Giorgio must
really love flowers, the way he cares for them all.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Judging from the condition of the soil, one of
these fields is for root vegetables and one is for
leaf vegetables. Am I right?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Who is using that field now?
<PAGE>
Transplanting crops every time the owner
changes might stress out the plants...
<PAGE>
Hopefully, the new caretaker will keep using this
field for a long time...but things don't always go
the way they should.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
When I look at the farm over there, I can tell that
noisy farmer is rough-and-ready.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But I can see that he's working hard. Guess he's
doing his best.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This is a big river. Which means it's full of fish,
all slimy and wriggly... Ugh. I shudder every time
I think about 'em.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Each farmer likes to grow different crops in
different ways. So it's easy to tell who's using
which field.
<PAGE>
Hm? Do I know who's using this one? ...Well,
I'm not totally sure.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But looking at what's being grown and how it's
tended will give you clues as to who's farming
the land.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Elise grows her paddy crops well.
<PAGE>
Most farmers pay less attention to paddy crops,
since they don't need to be watered, but she's
given them a lot of love and care.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since I'm studying plants on the mountain every
day, I think I "get" the mountain more than the
town, honestly.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm trying to keep myself away from Giorgio's
house.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>You know, he says sweet words whenever he
sees someone, right? I can't take it, so...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not good at talking to people. You can talk to
me, but I can't promise I'll say anything back.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like collecting seeds. So if you have some rare
seeds, please show me. I'd be happy to see
them.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Sometimes I study plants so hard that I forget all
about sleep and food...
<PAGE>
Plants are sneaky that way. They can take over
your life if you're not careful.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Before I came here, I was staying at my uncle's
house.
<PAGE>
A lot of people say he's got a scary-looking face,
because he does, but he's actually a really nice
guy who likes plants and kids.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I guess sometimes I can come across as rude,
or too blunt, so I end up hurting people's
feelings without knowing it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So if anything I ever say offends you, please
don't hesitate to tell me.
<PAGE>
I'd rather argue about it and make up afterwards
than never talk about it at all...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I think...our relationship is strong enough for
that.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I was in college, I took on all the
coursework I could, because I wanted to get
into research as soon as possible.
<PAGE>
Thanks to that, I got my Ph.D. early. Now I can
do all the research I want.
<PAGE>
If I'd taken even one night off in all that time, I
wouldn't be in this town right now.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I think you're one of the few people I can
call...um, my friend.
<PAGE>
So tell me more about yourself...
<PAGE>
Starting now, I want to understand you as much
as you understand me.
<PAGE>
And someday, I want to be...your b-best
friend...!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...What do you want? I'm busy. If you need to
talk to me, make it quick.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
People wear me out... Plants are so much easier
to work with...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
How did I get to be your girlfriend? I still can't
believe it, so I pinch my cheeks every morning...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I feel like somebody is watching... "Somebody
who?" Come on, like you don't know!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Whenever I'm with you, the people in town give
me a look!
<PAGE>
You told them we're dating, didn't you?! Great,
now I'm so embarrassed I want to die! Thanks a
lot!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...People tell me I started looking...softer and
more feminine after we started dating.
<PAGE>
I don't think I look any different... It's not like
dating just does that to people, right?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Huh? You want to know what I like about
you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Wh-what are you talking about all of a
sudden...?! I'm not going to say it! Nope, can't
hear you! Not gonna say a thing!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>I never thought I'd be into anything more than
plants. 
<PAGE>
But dating you has shown me otherwise...and
that's all I can say.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...What do you want? If you don't need me for
anything, don't talk to me.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You're not a plant. And by that I mean, "If you
have complaints about our marriage, just tell
me."

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Since we got married, you've been getting colder
and colder... Did I do something wrong?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Before I married you, I was all about my research
and had no interest in anything else. But now, I
think I can improve on that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...I can, right? Improve on that, I mean.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been thinking about how to help you. You
know, as your wife...
<PAGE>
Since I'm a botanist, I think I can give you some
good advice on how to grow crops.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>That's all I came up with...but I'm pretty
confident about that, at least. So you can ask
me anything.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Since we got married, it's been nothing but
peace and happiness every day.
<PAGE>
This is... This is real contentment, isn't it?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Since I married you, I've been so happy and
satisfied every day. How about you,
<MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
I hope I'm giving you the same feelings you're
giving me...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
It's still a little embarrassing to be dating you. I
mean, not because YOU'RE embarrassing, but...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It might take some time, but I'd like us to be
friends again eventually.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
It's hard to believe we're back together. It's a
dream come true, literally.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
We're really getting married soon, huh...? I still
can't quite believe it.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I know I'm not a perfect wife, but let's do all we
can to make a happy family together.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I wonder what our baby's going to be like. I can't
wait to meet her, or him.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's weird getting kicked in the stomach from the
inside. Only moms can ever feel that. Makes it
kind of precious, in a way.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Every time I think of our baby, just about to be
born, I get nervous. I hope nothing bad
happens...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Look, <MYNAME>. Look at our babies' little
hands and feet! Sooo cute!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I don't remember much about my childhood, but
did we grow this fast when we were little?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Phew, raising kids is TOUGH...
<PAGE>
But when I see our kids' little smiles, I don't feel
tired at all.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>That's...! This is my favorite. Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, I really like these...! You're sure I can have
it? Thank you.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Huh...? Is this for me? Always happy to get a
gift I like.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a present for me? I see. I'll accept it.
Thanks.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What? Is this a present? But I don't even like
these... Well, all right, give it to me.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...Being socially obligated to accept this present
makes me very, very sad. Please pick something
else next time.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Why does this feel so slimy... WHOA?! Is this
a...a <BLUE>large blotched snakehead</BLUE>?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>H-hey, stop! Keep it away! I don't want it... Hey,
don't put it in my bag without asking! That's so
mean!!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>P-please, just take it out! Seriously, right now!!
Aieee, nooo!!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A golden seed...! Can I really have it?! Thank
you! I'll take good care of it!!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is amazing. It's golden. It must be a rare
seed. I'll use it for my research. Thank you.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, this is golden. It's amazing. Is this for
me? Thank you.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)
Let's not give her a present for now.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A present? I'm good.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't want it. I'm angry right now.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Trying to buy your way back into my good
graces? After all that time you spent not talking
to me? I don't think so.
<PAGE>
If you think you've done something wrong, just
apologize with the best of intentions.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nah, you've already given me something today.
Thanks for the thought, though.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm good today. You just gave me a present.
Don't bother.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Okay, WHY are you trying to give me so many
presents? Are you trying to make up for
something? What are you hiding?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>This is my favorite!
<PAGE>
...Huh? It's a birthday present for me? I see, you
saved the best for my birthday... Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present for me? Oh, it is my birthday,
isn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>This is... You sure you want to give me
something this nice? Thank you.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present for me? Oh, right, today's my
birthday.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>This is... You know what I like, don't you? Thank
you. I'll accept it.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present for me? Oh, today is my
birthday, huh? Thank you. I'll accept it.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present for me? Oh, today is my
birthday, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I, um, I don't really like these, but I guess I'll take
it. Happy birthday to me.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present for me? Oh, today is my
birthday, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Um, this is really not the kind of thing I'd want
for a birthday present, but since you're giving it
to me...thanks.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present? Oh, right, today is my
birthday. Waaait a second. Why does this feel so
slimy...?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R><FACE_LOSS>WHOA!! You're trying to give me a <BLUE>large blotched
snakehead</BLUE>?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>H-hey, stop! Keep it away! I don't want it... Hey,
don't put it in my bag without asking! That's so
mean!!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>P-please, just take it out! You're making my bag
all slimy and gross! Aiieeee!! Worst birthday
ever!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Isn't this a golden seed...?! Can I really have it?!
<PAGE>
Huh? A birthday present? Oh, right, today is
my... That's why you gave me something
special, huh? Thank you.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This golden shine is amazing. Must be a rare
seed.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Huh? A birthday present for me? Oh, right, today
is my... Thank you. I'm flattered.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that shining...in gold? Must be rare.
<PAGE>
Huh? A birthday present for me? I see. Today is
my... Thank you. I'll accept it.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know animals are cute, but I don't think it's
nice to catch them against their will.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If animals like to be held, that's fine. But if not,
you should let them go.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How did you manage to catch an ermine? Well,
it doesn't really matter. You should take it back
where you found it and let it go.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you going to keep that as a pet? Well, don't
drag it around. You'll stress it out.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know you want to carry that animal around,
but you know it doesn't like it. Just put it back
where you found it, will you?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why did you bring a monkey? Are you two
friends?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Whoa, a parrot...?! P-please keep it away from
me!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please keep that thing away from me.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Except for the amount of fur, how is this rabbit
different from a regular wild rabbit?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Whoa. I don't like birds, not even baby ones!
Sorry, but...please keep it away from me...!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Whoa, I don't like birds! Sorry, but please just
keep it away from me...!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This dog is very affectionate. Not unlike
someone I know...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...How did that dog get so ridiculously fat? I
mean, look at him! You can't not see it, right?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Whoa! What are you doing?! Don't lick me! I
don't actually TASTE like...!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...How did that dog get so incredibly fat? Did
you spoil him?
